sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import "./WeatherComponent.css"; import ForecastleChart from '../ForecastleChart/ForecastleChart'; import { getWeather } from '../api/api'; const WeatherComponent = () => { const [weather, setWeather] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { const getWeatherData = async() => { const dataFromServer = await getWeather('Kyiv'); const weatherData = { cityName: dataFromServer.name, icon: dataFromServer["weather"][0].icon, temperature: dataFromServer.main.temp, humidity: dataFromServer.main.humidity, pressure: dataFromServer.main.pressure, feels_like: dataFromServer , } localStorage.setItem('city', JSON.stringify(weatherData)) setWeather(dataFromServer); } getWeatherData() }, []); return (
Cherkasy, UA
FRI, 19 February, 10:17
Sunny
{weather && }
18 Deg
Feels like: +22 deg
Wind: 16 m/s
Humidity: 13%
Pressure: 600Pa
) } export default WeatherComponent
